text: Ralph Breaks the Internet is a 2018 American 3D computer-animated comedy movie directed by Rich Moore and Phil Johnston. It is the sequel to the 2012 movie Wreck-It Ralph. This movie stars John C. Reilly, Sarah Silverman, Jack McBrayer, Jane Lynch, Ed O'Neill, Alan Tudyk, Gal Gadot, Taraji P. Henson and Alfred Molina. The movie was produced by Walt Disney Animation Studios and distributed by Walt Disney Pictures. Ralph Breaks the Internet was Walt Disney Animation Studios's first PG-rated animated sequel and it's first CGI sequel. == Other websites == * Category:2018 comedy movies Category:2018 computer- animated movies Category:2010s action comedy movies Category:2018 fantasy movies Category:Disney animated movies Category:American action comedy movies Category:American fantasy-comedy movies Category:American sequel movies Category:Movies set in 2018 Category:2010s sequel movies Category:Movies about children
title: Ralph Breaks the Internet
